alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:24PM EDT until August 03 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wayne County in southeastern Michigan... Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 624 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manchester, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ann Arbor and Saline around 635 PM EDT. Ypsilanti, Dixboro and Willis around 645 PM EDT. Belleville around 650 PM EDT. Canton around 655 PM EDT. Romulus around 700 PM EDT. Taylor and Greenfield Village around 705 PM EDT. Detroit, Dearborn and Wyandotte around 710 PM EDT. Downtown Detroit and Belle Isle around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Melvindale, Whittaker, Hudson Mills Metropark, New Boston, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake, Harper Woods, Westland, Grosse Pointe Shores and Ecorse. People attending the Aretha Franklin Amphitheater should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
